summary: Improves dragons, giving them new shouts. WIP with additional features planned and suggestions welcome. Also creates new types of dragons.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Hey you, yes you, the person viewing this mod page, do you like how dragons have so few shouts available to them compared to the player, despite dragons being supposed masters of The Thu'um?
Do you like how dragons are only divided into fire and frost, with none doing shock damage?
If your answer to either of these is yes, then this mod is not for you. Otherwise, download this mod.
[/size]
[b][size=5]What this mod does:[/size]
[/b][size=3][list][*][size=3]Gives dragons additional shouts. Note that the amount of shouts available increases with dragon type e.g. an ancient dragon has more shouts than a blood dragon.[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]The dragon's unrelenting force shout is now a proper unrelenting force, made complete with knocking the weapons out of the hands of those hit, disarming them.[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Alduin has more shouts in particular, and since Alduin is a fire dragon, being resistant to fire and weak to frost damage, removed Alduin's ice based attacks. (though there is an alternate file you can download if you don't like that)[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Adds storm dragons that use spells that deal shock damage.[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Also adds vampire dragons that drain life and should spread Sanguinare Vampiris[/size][/*]
[/list][/size]
[size=5][b]Planned features:[/b]
[/size][list][*][size=3]More types of dragons.[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Dragons gain random shouts.[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Re-texture new dragon types.[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Add Dragonlings.[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Improve Dragon nests.[/size]
[/*][/list]
[b][size=5]How to install this:[/size][/b]
[size=3]1. Open the compressed file this readme is in[/size]
[size=3]2. Copy DragonsEnhanced.esp to Skyrim's data folder[/size]
[size=3]3. ???[/size]
[size=3]4. Profit[/size]
[i][size=3]Also, this mod is currently a WIP and suggestions are welcome[/size]
[/i][b]
[size=5]What makes  this mod unique:[/size][/b]
[size=3]The fact that no DLC is required! In fact, no DLC is recommended since if you use DLC that adds dragons, the new dragons won't have any new shouts. Hearthfire should, however, be fine (as far as I know)

[/size][/font][size=5]Recommended mods:[/size]
[list][*][size=3]Unofficial Skyrim Patch http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/? [i]Fixes a lot of bugs  in Skyrim, a must-have[/i][/size]
[/*][*][size=3]SimpleSpells http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62908/[i] Awesome mod, made by an awesome guy, it also has a rather small file size, like this mod[/i][/size][/*]
[/list]
